recipient.name: Ms. Leila Stroud
recipient.address: 1445 Wren Pl SW, S Brunswick, NC 28470

body: Thank you for contacting us. We appreciate your interest and would be happy to accommodate your request. Our Company policy states that we do not promote to anyone under the age of 21. Since your letter did not state your age, we would ask that you call the toll-free number on your cigarette pack to provide your date-of-birth. When we receive this information from you, we will be happy to send you a Doral order form. Again, thank you for taking the time to contact us. All of us at Reynolds send our best wishes.
title: Consumer Relations Specialist
